name: Scrapybara
title: scrapybara.com
shortDescription: Scrapybara provides virtual desktops tailored for AI agents, enabling seamless integration and execution of computer use models. It's designed for developers and researchers who need to automate tasks or perform deep web scraping at scale. An example use case is CodeCapy, which uses Scrapybara to test code changes and perform UI tests across multiple instances.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: AWS WorkSpaces
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Cloud-based virtual desktops with AWS integration

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Azure Virtual Desktop
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Flexible virtual desktops in Azure cloud
